about_the_game:
Intiface Central provides free and easy access to over 300 different pieces of haptics and sensor hardware. Connect to games, VR, and interactive experiences using our open source API, with capabilities to work on Windows, macOS, and Linux, including SteamOS on the Steam Deck.

Intiface Central allows for multiple types of haptic actuation, including

- Vibration
- Rotation
- Linear movement
- Constriction/Inflation systems

As well as sensor systems like

- Pressure
- Temperature
- Position

and more!

content_descriptors.notes: Our application connects to some adult haptics devices (i.e. sex toys) in order to allow for haptics control and sensor reading. While none of the content in the application itself is explicit, names of devices are used in marketing and on connection.

Intiface Central allows for multiple types of haptic actuation, including

As well as sensor systems like

name: Intiface Central

pc_requirements.minimum:
